title: FS: 1910 T211 Red Sun Lafitte (New Orleans) SGC 1.5 SOLD
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: FS: 1910 T211 Red Sun Lafitte (New Orleans) SGC 1.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD

For Sale only. No trades, please.

Unfortunately, this beauty no longer fits in my collection and it's time for it to move onto another.

1910 T211 Red Sun Lafitte (New Orleans) SGC 1.5 

This is a tough one to price and let go. Listening to offers first before I add an asking price.

Most forms of payment accepted.

PM me and we'll talk.

Christopher
